ShapeEngine
Table of Contents

Struct Triangle

Namespace
ShapeEngine.Core.Shapes
Assembly
ShapeEngine.dll

Class that represents a triangle by holding three points. Points a, b, c should be in ccw order!

public readonly struct Triangle : IEquatable<Triangle>
Implements
IEquatable<Triangle>
Inherited Members
